original_text: The Spirit that you have received from God does not make you serve him like slaves. That would make you afraid again. No. The Spirit that God has given to you causes you to become God's children. Now he takes care of you. God's Spirit makes us call God: ‘ Abba, our Father.’
korean_text: 너희는 다시 무서워하는 종의 영을 받지 아니하고 양자의 영을 받았으므로 우리가 아빠 아버지라고 부르짖느니라

sentences.original_text: The Spirit that you have received from God
does not make you serve him like slaves
That would make you afraid again
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다시 너를 두렵게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Spirit that God has given to you
causes you to become God's children
Now he takes care of you
God's Spirit makes us call God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 성령은 우리가 하나님을 부르게 한다
